name: Homepage
body:
### Everything on this page is a work in progress!

### Aniket's Homepage
This is a place to collect random stuff I've made on the internet.

### Lady Blackbird
[Lady Blackbird](http://www.onesevendesign.com/ladyblackbird/) is a free, rules-light RPG and setting by [John Harper](http://www.onesevendesign.com/). There is a mechanic in Lady Blackbird where you are given a target number and a set of dice, and you have to decide before rolling whether you wish to add additional dice from your personal pool. I am always wondering how much value I get from adding additional dice, so I wrote a calculator for it.

### Author
Aniket Schneider (@aniketschneider)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
